newsitem.title: USA: Strattec Security progressing on profits.
newsitem.headline: Strattec Security progressing on profits.

text.p: Strattec Security Corp, which reported a solid increase in third-quarter earnings, said Thursday it is making progress in overcoming growing pains that have affected its profitability.
Earlier, the company said net income in the period ended March 30 reached $2.9 million, or $0.51 a share, compared to $2.6 million, or $0.45, one year ago.

Strattec said it expects reasonably strong sales in the last quarter of the current fiscal year and continued progress in fiscal 1998 for its Mexican operations, which are facing increased price pressure.
Strattec makes locks and other security devices for automobile manufacturers.
Its shares closed unchanged Thursday at 16-7/8.
